name: Algorhythm
description:
Play a sarcastic box as it evades hordes of sad boxes to reach the end of the song! Execute combos on the beat to fight back!

Algorhythm was scrambled together from the remains of an orphaned game jam submission. Its mere existence is nothing short of a miracle.

Garrison Price - Programming

David Kahn - Music/sfx

with help from

Miguel Torres - Programming

Jason Kaufman - 3D modeling, design

Matt Grabbe - Art

Abdiel Cuin - Art

made for the IGDA San Diego Game Jam 2019
